field.name: description
field.value:
Ok, Firefox crashed when I typed this up the first time. Here's some psuedocode instead of a big long detailed message.
if(uri != null) remoting.uri = baseUri + uri + UriExtension else remoting.uri = baseUri + baseUri + componentId + UriExtension
I'm positive the bottom case is not correct, but I'm pretty sure the top case isn't either. It appears on every other remoting strategy that the uri should already be a full uri from the config. I've submitted a patch that does the following.
if(uri != null) remoting.uri = uri + UriExtension else remoting.uri = baseUri + componentId + UriExtension
This of course does change the behavior when a uri is specified in the configuration, now the uri needs to be a complete uri with the baseUri prepended.
